description: Single storey rear extension, outbuilding ancillary/incidental to main dwelling ( following demolition of existing extension)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing titles and documents: Revisions - Proposed plans - outbuilding B0210 Rev. P1, Main House elevations B0110 Rev P2, Proposed site planB0010 Rev. P2, Site Section and Elevation B0020 Rev P2, Main House Proposed Floor Plans B0100 Rev. P2 and Main House Proposed Sections B0120 Rev P2.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form Section 11 and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) and 2.1 (C) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan (2016)
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g),  2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| The overhang of the extension hereby approved shall not be infilled.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| The development permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD 2013, policy 1.1(h), and 2.1(c) of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016.
